string-array.name: risksString
string-array.item: 3. High blood cholesterol and triglycerides (dyslipidemia, or high blood fats)
4. Heart attacks due to coronary heart disease, heart failure, and stroke.
5. Bone and joint problems, more weight puts pressure on the bones and joints. This can lead to osteoarthritis, a disease that causes joint pain and stiffness.
6. Stopping breathing during sleep (sleep apnea). This can cause daytime fatigue or sleepiness, poor attention, and problems at work.
9. Body pain and difficulty with physical functioning
10. Mental illness such as clinical depression, anxiety, and other mental disorders
11. Osteoarthritis (a breakdown of cartilage and bone within a joint)
15. High LDL cholesterol, low HDL cholesterol, or high levels of triglycerides (Dyslipidemia)
